events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the product does not match the description and I am unhappy with it.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's description of dissatisfaction with the product.
This case has been assigned to an agent specialized in refund processing to handle the customer's concerns promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand that you'd like to request a refund. I’m here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and explain the reason for the refund request so I can process this efficiently?
My order number is 123456789. The item arrived with a different color and feels cheaper than advertised. I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund once you return the product. I will send you the prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the return label. I’ll send the product back today and appreciate your help with the refund.
We have received your returned item and processed the full refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund, and if there’s anything else we can assist you with, please let us know.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are now closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
